text: The 2007 Kwun Tong District Council election was held on 18 November 2007 to elect all 34 elected members to the 42-member District Council. ==Overall election results== Before election: {| style="width:50%; text-align:center;" |+ ↓ |- style="color:white;" | style="background:green; width:50%;" | 17 | style="background:gray; width:3%;" | 1 | style="background:red; width:47%;" | 16 |- | Pro-democracy | I. | Pro-Beijing |} Change in composition: {| style="width:50%; text-align:center;" |+ ↓ |- style="color:white;" | style="background:green; width:23.5%;" | 8 | style="background:gray; width:2.9%;" | 1 | style="background:red; width:73.5%;" | 25 |- | Pro- democracy | I. | Pro-Beijing |} ==References== ==External links== * Election Results - Overall Results Category:2007 Hong Kong local elections
title: 2007 Kwun Tong District Council election
